caption: This photograph depicts a group of individuals engaged in a roadside clean-up activity. The setting is an outdoor area beside a road, showing a grassy verge strewn with litter, such as cans and crumpled papers. There are five people visible, all wearing red jackets, black pants, and sturdy shoes; they look equipped for outdoor work. Each person carries a white bucket, presumably to collect the refuse. They are walking in a line formation, heading away from the viewer towards a parked vehicle at the rear; this vehicle is a large yellow truck with an open back, potentially used for hauling the collected garbage. In the background, the road extends parallel to the scene, with a clear sky and thin trees visible, suggesting a rural or semi-rural setting. The focus and orientation of the subjects suggest a coordinated effort in a communal or volunteer environmental clean-up activity.
title: Bethlehem Steel plant at Sparrows Point
